colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSGOM BZLAS, SHIN TU BSDUS PA LHA CHU THIG PA 'DI YANG, BSTAN PA'I SPYAN BDAG SANGS RGYAS SKYABS WANG KHRON BYA BA'I PHYIR DANG, DAD MOS LDAN PA BSOD SBYIN PA HA THUNG GYIS, ,LHAG BSAM BZANG PO'I BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BKA' 'GYUR BA AER TE NI MIR GEN CHOS RJES 'PHRAL DU SBYAR BA'I DGE BA BYANG CHUB THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: AER TE NI MIR GEN CHOS RJE,
